ai_business_context: The Spot is a new restaurant with a dining room, kitchen, bar, and patio. Customers and staff submit feedback about service quality, cleanliness, and facility/maintenance issues across front-of-house and back-of-house areas.
ai_categorization_instructions: Prefer specific categories. When unsure, use `other` and add a short note to internal context.

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: dirty, sticky, smell, trash, spill, grime, sanitize, pests, flies, gnats
issue_categories.description: Cleanliness, sanitation, trash, odors, and pest concerns.
issue_categories.label: Cleanliness & Hygiene

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: broken, leaking, clogged, plumbing, toilet, sink, faucet, door, handle, lock, drain
issue_categories.description: Plumbing, fixtures, doors, and general facility repairs.
issue_categories.label: Maintenance & Repair

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: hot, cold, AC, air conditioning, heater, ventilation, hood, smoke, stuffy
issue_categories.description: HVAC, ventilation, temperature comfort, and air quality.
issue_categories.label: HVAC & Ventilation

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: light, lighting, dim, flicker, bulb, dark
issue_categories.label: Lighting

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: service, slow, wait, rude, attentive, host, bartender, server, communication
issue_categories.label: Service Quality

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: safety, hazard, slippery, trip, broken glass, sharp, blocked, emergency
issue_categories.label: Safety Hazard

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: equipment, POS, printer, soda, ice, dishwasher, cooler, fridge, oven, fryer
issue_categories.description: Operational equipment issues impacting service or kitchen/bar operations.
issue_categories.label: Equipment / Operational

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: restroom, bathroom, soap, paper towels, toilet paper, hand dryer
issue_categories.label: Restroom Experience

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: menu, food, taste, cold food, wrong order, allergy, quality
issue_categories.description: Food quality, accuracy, and menu-related feedback.
issue_categories.label: Food Quality & Order Accuracy

issue_categories.description: Use when unsure; add a short note to internal context.
issue_categories.label: Other

comments.body: Thanks—restroom checklist updated. Please keep reporting if supplies run low during peak.

issues.description: Women's restroom ran out of paper towels during dinner rush; hand dryer is weak so guests had no good way to dry hands.

reports.body: No paper towels in the women's bathroom around 7:30pm.
Paper towel dispenser was empty and the hand dryer barely works.
Still empty when I checked again before leaving (about 8:10).

issues.title: Women's restroom out of paper towels

updates.message: Restocked paper towels; added backup rolls to storage cabinet.
Replaced hand dryer filter and increased maintenance frequency.

comments.body: We’re coaching the host team on quoting accurate waits and doing table touch-backs for delays.

issues.description: Guests reported long waits at the host stand with unclear communication about table timing; some parties were skipped or not updated.

reports.body: Waited ~15 minutes past the quoted time and no one checked in with us.
Host seemed overwhelmed—our name got lost and we had to ask twice.
Not sure if there’s a text system, but we didn’t get any updates while waiting.

issues.title: Long waits and unclear communication at host stand

updates.message: Implemented a waitlist script and added a 10-minute check-in reminder for hosts.

issues.description: Soda station area is sticky with syrup residue; drip tray and nozzles appear overdue for deep clean, attracting small gnats.

reports.body: The floor by the soda machine was sticky and my shoes kept catching.
Soda nozzles looked crusty and there were a couple tiny flies around it.

issues.title: Sticky soda station and gnats

updates.message: Assigned nightly deep-clean of soda nozzles and drip tray; added mid-shift wipe-down.

comments.body: If it starts sticking again, please note the time—humidity seems to affect it.

issues.description: Patio door is hard to open/close and sometimes doesn’t latch, letting warm air and insects in.

reports.body: Patio door sticks and takes two hands to pull open.
Door didn’t latch behind someone and it stayed cracked open.
We had bugs coming in near the patio entrance because the door wasn’t closing all the way.

issues.title: Patio door sticking and not latching

updates.message: Adjusted door closer and strike plate; lubricated hinges.
Replaced worn weather stripping to improve seal.

issues.description: Bar POS printer intermittently stops printing tickets; bartenders are reprinting from the terminal which slows service.

reports.body: Ticket printer at the bar kept flashing red and wouldn’t print for a few minutes.
Had to reprint drink tickets twice—printer jammed again.

issues.title: Bar ticket printer intermittently failing

updates.message: Swapped paper roll and cleaned feed rollers; monitoring for repeat jams.

comments.body: We placed a wet-floor sign and added a reminder to mop immediately after ice runs.

issues.description: Water pooling near bar service station creates a slip hazard, likely from ice melt and splash during busy service.

reports.body: Floor behind the bar (near the service station) was wet and slippery.
Almost slipped walking past the bar service area—there was a puddle.
Seems like it happens when they’re scooping ice; water ends up on the floor.

issues.title: Slippery floor near bar service station

updates.message: Added absorbent bar mats and checked ice bin drain line for clogs.

issues.description: Dining room main floor feels stuffy and warm during peak hours; airflow seems uneven with hot spots near the center tables.

reports.body: It was noticeably warm inside even though it wasn’t that hot outside.
Air felt stagnant near the middle of the dining room—no breeze at all.

issues.title: Dining room feels warm and stuffy

updates.message: Scheduled HVAC contractor to balance vents; replaced two clogged filters.

issues.description: Men's restroom toilet intermittently runs and sometimes won’t flush fully; handle feels loose.

reports.body: Toilet in the men’s room kept running after flushing.
Flush handle is loose and you have to jiggle it to stop the water.

issues.title: Men's restroom toilet running / loose handle

updates.message: Inspected flapper chain and handle; parts ordered for replacement.

issues.description: Dish pit area has a lingering sour odor and visible buildup around the floor drain; likely needs a drain clean-out and deodorizing.

reports.body: Dish area smells sour, especially near the drain.
There’s gunk around the floor drain in dish pit—needs a deep clean.
Odor gets worse at close; maybe the drain is backing up a bit.

issues.title: Sour odor and buildup at dish pit drain

updates.message: Performed drain clean-out and enzymatic treatment; added weekly drain maintenance to closing checklist.

issues.description: A light fixture over window seating flickers and occasionally goes out, making that section feel dim at night.

reports.body: Light above our table by the window kept flickering.
The window-side seating area is darker than the rest because one light is out.

issues.title: Flickering light over window seating

updates.message: Replaced bulb and tightened fixture connection; flicker resolved.

comments.body: We’re re-training expo on allergy callouts and adding a second verification on modified tickets.

issues.description: A modified order was delivered incorrectly (requested no cheese, arrived with cheese). Guest flagged allergy concern and needed a remake.

reports.body: Asked for no cheese due to allergy and it came out with cheese on it.
Server handled it quickly but it was still stressful—please double check allergy mods.

issues.title: Modified order delivered incorrectly (allergy concern)

updates.message: Added allergy/mod verification step at expo; reminded staff to verbally confirm on delivery.

issues.description: Music volume in the bar area is loud enough that guests have trouble hearing each other, especially near the speakers.

reports.body: Music was so loud at the bar we had to shout to talk.
Could you turn it down a notch? It’s hard to hear the bartender too.

issues.title: Bar music volume too loud

issues.description: Patio trash and bus station gets overfilled on weekends; odors and flies build up when bins aren’t emptied mid-shift.

reports.body: Trash cans by the patio bus station were overflowing and smelled bad.
Lots of flies around the patio trash area—needs more frequent emptying.
Weekend lunch rush: bins were full by 1pm.

issues.title: Overflowing patio trash attracting flies

updates.message: Added a scheduled mid-shift trash run on weekends; replaced one bin with a larger lidded can.

issues.description: Kitchen line heat lamp over the pass is intermittently cutting out; food sits without heat while waiting for runners.

reports.body: Heat lamp over the pass keeps shutting off—noticed plates cooling while waiting.
Lamp flickered and went out twice during service.

issues.title: Heat lamp cutting out on kitchen pass

updates.message: Checked wiring and replaced bulb; monitoring during next services. If it fails again, electrician scheduled.

issues.description: Entrance mat curls up at one corner creating a trip hazard, especially when the door swings and catches the edge.

reports.body: The mat at the front door is curled up—almost tripped walking in.
Door catches the corner of the mat and flips it up.

issues.title: Front entrance mat curled (trip hazard)
